|---------|------|------------|-------------|
| Detroit suburbs | 7-2 Kowalski | 6.8 | Auto identity, abortion |
| Flint/Saginaw base | 10-0 Kowalski | 7.4 | Water crisis, union |
| West Michigan suburbs | 5-3 Kowalski | 6.5 | Abortion, education |
| West Michigan business | Split | Low | Taxes, regulation |
| Union households | 90%+ Kowalski | High | Endorsements, record |
